short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display absolute dates on GitHub pages instead of relative time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension replaces relative time expressions on GitHub with absolute dates, making it easier to understand when events occurred without hovering over timestamps. 
For example this plugin will convert relative time expressions (e.g., "2 days ago") to absolute dates (e.g., "Jun 15, 2023")
For contribution, please visit https://github.com/pkid/github-absolute-time-chrome-plugin
